likes.added: {user} kullanıcısının profilini beğendin, kendisinin şu anda {num} beğenisi var.
likes.dm:
{emote} Congratulations, {name}!

I have some fantastic news to share with you! Your {bot} profile has reached an incredible {num} likes! You're clearly doing something right because people just can't get enough of you!

So let's keep the momentum going and spread the love! Tell everyone to invite {bot} by sending them {link} and make sure to use the {command} followed by your username to heart 💖 your profile!

Thank you for being such a fantastic part of our community!

Cheers,
{bot}
